participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and creative, with a love for outdoor activities and artistic expression.
participant_1.background: I like to play outside with my brothers on the Fourth of July. I work for a small, family-owned restaurant. My longest relationship was four years and I'm not sure if I'm ready for another one. I have taken formal music lessons since I was 5. My favorite class is painting.

participant_2.name: Sofia
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and family-oriented, with a passion for food and travel.
participant_2.background: I enjoy spending my free time outdoors, either riding my bike or playing with my dogs. My favorite food is anything Italian. My most exotic travel experience was when I went to Thailand and saw the floating markets. I work at a restaurant as a waiter. I have 5 children.

content.text: Hi there! What's your favorite food?
I love anything Italian, but I also love seafood.
I love going to The Olive Garden.
I love that place! Have you ever been to Thailand?
Yes! I went there a few years ago and it was amazing! I saw all the floating markets and had so much fun.
That sounds amazing! What did you do there?
I went to the beach, ate a lot of delicious food, and spent a lot of time with my family. It was a great trip.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm so glad you had a good time.
Me too! I'm looking forward to going back someday.
I'm sure you'll have a great time.
